articles.initialTitle: Aston Villa latest: Emery wants players' futures resolved before window shuts
articles.telegramContent:
🚨 Villa in Crisis? Emery Demands Transfer Clarity! ⚽

Emery wants futures sorted NOW! Is a Villa exodus looming before September 1st? 💥 Brentford loss exposes squad weaknesses.

"Staying or going?" Emery's patience wearing thin. He hints at NEW signings to reignite Villa's spark. ⭐

Quiet window? NOT for long! Emery's message: "Keep calm… but work!"

Brentford debutant stuns Villa. Ouattara the new hero?🏆 Full report & highlights dropping soon. Don't miss out! What moves will Villa make? 🔥 #AVFC #TransferNews #PremierLeague #Football
